alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:29PM CDT until July 14 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clark County in central Wisconsin... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenwood, or 16 miles north of Neillsville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Loyal around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County K And Capital Road, Chili, Highway 73 And 98, Riplinger, Veefkind and Unity. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
